::Epyon/Hot Rod/Prowl/Skyburst::

Epyon holds his ground as he is hit, and starts to clup on Lyas back. 

Hot Rod rolls out to the apron and gets up, when Aerotaur's message
comes in. He opens a comm back to them.
"You got it. I'll be coming with reinforcements ASAP. Who's attacking
you anyway?"

As Hot Rod waits for the reply, Prowl steps up.
"Time out, guys, you heard that. Hot Rod, Epyon, Skyburst, you guys are
going to come with me, to help them."
He looked to Lyas, and the others.
"You guys can help too."

They all leave the holoroom, and pass by the Med Bay.
"Khonkolor, we are going to go help the Chivtron's in a battle, want to
come?" Asks Prowl.

Prowl and the others dont really wait for a reply, they continue on out,
and pass Ghost and Goth.
"Some of our friends are in trouble. We going to help. You guys want to
join us?" Asked Skyburst.

They all waited for a minute, before leaving, to get the responses from
Pegatron's group, Khonkolor, Ghost, Goth, and the reply from Aerotaur.
